MarkerCategory.name: raidT
MarkerCategory.tip-description: This toggles the entire raid tracking feature.

MarkerCategory.name: c1
MarkerCategory.tip-description: This toggles the blue borders around encounters.

MarkerCategory.name: sc1
MarkerCategory.tip-description: This toggles Full Clear instance tracking.

MarkerCategory.name: c2
MarkerCategory.tip-description: This toggles the entire chest tracking feature.

MarkerCategory.name: c3
MarkerCategory.tip-description: This toggles the Weekly CM tracking feature If lua scripts are enabled, all in-raid markers disappear on combat start.

MarkerCategory.name: c99
MarkerCategory.tip-description: Only works if Lua Scripts are enabled
